properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
VESSEL, 100 PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED
AND ADRIFT DUE TO ENGINE FAILURE IN
33-19N 013-45E AT 140950Z AUG. VESSELS
IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS
TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 390 6592 4145 3906 5908 4409,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
